entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On dotnet publish for Mac, getting unclear error "error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly... System.InvalidOperationException: Unrecognized AssetType 'resource' " #40015
  • AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild failing to `new` F# projects #40011
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Update logic for how workload version is displayed #40005

Closed

  • `--create-manifest-if-needed` should be mentioned if no manifest exists #39329
  • relocate `global.json` under `.config/dotnet.json` or `.config/dotnet/global.json` #37281
  • We're seeing timeouts in some of the package install tests #36089
  • dotnet tool run <TOOL_NAME> doesn't work on Linux #33030
    9.0.1xx
  • Support `dotnet tool install` from local nuget package file #13429
    Backlog
  • runtime-options (--roll-forward) for local tools #26824
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add workload config command #39888
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2422523 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
